data.description:
The ultimate Table Tennis simulator. Play opponents in online multiplayer or practice against the advanced AI. With physics designed to be as real as ever achieved in a Table Tennis simulator, you will forget you are in VR.

Physics Engine :
From the very start, we have been obsessed with creating the most realistic table tennis simulation the World has ever seen. After countless hours of hard work and support from our amazing community, we believe that we accomplished that goal. 

We hope that you enjoy playing Eleven as much as we enjoy working on it. If you run into any issues or if you're interested in joining our ever-growing community of table tennis fanatics, follow the link in the additional details section and join us on our discord.

changelog.change_log:
0.304.0

**fixes**:
-[North Korea is listed as Nepal in the Flag Selection screen. #469](https://github.com/ForFunLabs/ElevenPublicBugsAndAsks/issues/469)
-[Some country names are missing from the country list. #478](https://github.com/ForFunLabs/ElevenPublicBugsAndAsks/issues/478)
-[world flag not selectable in list after tutorial #492](https://github.com/ForFunLabs/ElevenPublicBugsAndAsks/issues/492)
-[log sending will stop even when forced #494](https://github.com/ForFunLabs/ElevenPublicBugsAndAsks/issues/494)
-[floor indicator on portal is larger than other envs #500](https://github.com/ForFunLabs/ElevenPublicBugsAndAsks/issues/500)
-[portal will not load correctly sometimes #502](https://github.com/ForFunLabs/ElevenPublicBugsAndAsks/issues/502)
-[avatar images not shown in left panel #503](https://github.com/ForFunLabs/ElevenPublicBugsAndAsks/issues/503)
-removed unusable spectator mode option from pico graphics settings


**updates**
-[add ball speed info in wall mode #495](https://github.com/ForFunLabs/ElevenPublicBugsAndAsks/issues/495)
-Pico4 Ultra Controllers Added
-Vivox disabled
-continuing to work on replays:
	As we know many of you would want to share replays with others, or post them on your social media, we are working on a way for the headset itself to provide .mp4 files
	Additionally we are working on the UI for controlling the replays both with controllers and with the menu

0.332.3
-improved lighting on ball in all environments
-prep work for voip fix. (it's technically in the app, and you can test it if the other person is on the same version, but I need to get everyone on the new voip system and then I'll flip a server-side switch to flip everyone over)
-for 2d mode, updated log flush to instant (from 10 seconds). some users were asking for this change for some live shot metrics analysis via logs. 
-for 2d mode, Join Room feature is now available if you click on a user in your friends list
-brighter arena
-friend status improvement

0.324.0
-added hotfix to app to lock wifi hardware to help stabilize the connection (many users were experiencing cyclical ping spikes)

0.323.3
-fix for default rubbers
-fix typo in calibration page

0.323.1
-disconnect performance fix (pretty sure i found the reason the frame rate tanks when a user disconnects from you mid match)
-found a bug that caused some game logic desync. Specifically, if mid point, after you hit the ball, it hits a surface that isn't the table top, and then within the period of time allowed for multi hit, it hits your racket, then both players would disagree on the state of the match. This can happen if you hit the edge of your table and the ball rattles. 
-fixed the issue where for new users, the laser pointer wasn't being rendered at fresh start. 
-fixed the issue where post user report, the message wasn't shown (just a layering issue)
